name: WTF
description:
WHAT IS WTF (WhatTheFAQ)?
WTF is a chaotic first person shooter that confronts heavily armed players with "The Devil" himself.



"The Devil" can take many forms however you will have no doubt when you will see him, as he will wear all of the signs in plain sight.

THE SETTING
The world of WTF is set on the middle of the desert where you will meet the true evil of this world.

THE PLOT
The story starts somewhere on American-Mexican border where you and The Devil had an important discussion about government and taxes.

As your power of arguments do not work on him, you decide to use the argument of power.

FEATURES
Variety of "evil" to shoot and dice, ranging from devils from the past, up to the nowadays root of all evil, finishing with the Lord of The Dark Tower.

Multiple enemies to defeat with huge arsenal of weapons, ranging from revolvers, shotguns up to long range rifles & automatic guns.

WTF will take you on a immersive journey of purification and rooting out evil from this world, once for all.
